attributes.action: make private landlords accountable for their antisocial tennants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop private landlords putting antisocial tennants in their properties and making lives hell for the neighbours,they must be held accountable now. not all landlords are doing this but the few there are want stopping now as long as they get their rent they dont care how the tennants behave eg: swearing ,screaming in the early hours,violence fighting ,all police can do is to keep turning up and ask them to quieten down  we need powers to evict the tennants and fine the private landlords .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
